arts.ttl: Barcelona meet La Liga title challenge with Las Palmas win
arts.sum: Barcelona responded to the Saturday La Liga title challenge thrown down to them as they sealed a late 2-0 win away at Las Palmas. Rivals Atletico Madrid had edged back to the top of the rankings with a superb 3-0 victory on the road at Valencia. However, despite the pressure increase, Hansi Flick’s side needed […] The post Barcelona meet La Liga title challenge with Las Palmas win appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Las Palmas 0-2 Barcelona: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Blaugrana send out major La Liga title message
arts.sum: Barcelona return to the top of the La Liga table courtesy of a 2-0 success over Las Palmas at Estadio Gran Canaria on Saturday night.

arts.ttl: Las Palmas 0–2 Barcelona: Player Ratings As Barca Wins Fifth Straight Game in La Liga
arts.sum: Barcelona continued their strong form in La Liga and remain ahead of Atlético Madrid and Real Madrid in the title race.
